\nabla^{2}u=\frac{1}{c^{2}}\frac{\partial^{2}u}{\partial^{2}t}.

u(r,\theta,\phi)=R(r)\Theta(\theta)T(t).

T=cos\left(\omega t+\phi\right),
Theta RELOP:equals italic-c italic-o italic-s OPEN:( italic-m italic-theta ADDOP:plus italic-psi CLOSE:) PERIOD:.
\Theta=cos(m\theta+\psi).

R(r)=J_{m}(kr),

u(r,\theta,t)=0
